user.title: HP/Aruba Switch Configuration
user.description:
Enter the connection details for your HP/Aruba switch. This integration provides control over switch ports, PoE management, and port activity monitoring through SSH.

⚠️ Note: The integration may take 2-3 minutes to fully initialize all entities after adding. Switch controls will be available first, followed by port activity sensors.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the switch. Please check the host and network connectivity.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Please check your username and password.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
